name: Deep Journey
description:
Deep Journey

Deep Journey is the endless runner that takes place in a fantastic world. You will control a creature over the game, exploring the water depths while trying to reach as far as possible collecting valuable pearls! But... be careful, you may find hazards on the way.  

Who will reach the furthest and get the highest score?

FEATURES
★ Begin your journey with the Octopus!
★ Multiple power-ups / abilities to discover
★ Diverse obstacles to face during a run
★ Collect Pearls and Black Pearls!
★ Complete objectives and level up
★ Fight for your position at the Highscore leaderboards
★ Unlock character skins

Developed in 2017/18
